secret_rule: Only items that are typically associated with famous astronomical theories or hypotheses can be brought to the picnic.

conversation.content: To start, here are some examples of items you can bring: "Black holes" and "Cosmic microwave background".

Based on the examples "Black holes" and "Cosmic microwave background," the secret rule seems to involve concepts or phenomena related to astrophysics or cosmology—specifically, those that are fundamental to our understanding of the universe on a grand scale. My best guess is that the rule is "items that are key concepts in the field of cosmology."
